features: Do you follow both human influencers and virtual influencers?
Do you think virtual influencers have distinct personalities?
Do you feel that virtual influencers’ personalities adapt over time based on audience interactions?
Compared to human influencers, do virtual influencers feel more or less relatable?
Have you ever interacted with a virtual influencer (e.g., comments, messages, polls)?
Would you prefer virtual influencers to tailor their content based on your preferences?
If a virtual influencer adapted their personality to match your interests (e.g., recommending music or fashion you like), how would that affect your engagement?
How do you feel when a virtual influencer acknowledges user comments or feedback?
How important is authenticity when following an influencer (human or virtual)?
Do you feel emotionally connected to any virtual influencer?
Would you continue following a virtual influencer if you knew their personality was completely AI-generated and adaptive?
